item.title: Anyone still play this AMAZING mod?
item.author: invalid@example.com (double9s)
item.dc:creator: double9s
item.content:encoded:
I would really like to start playing CB regularly (VERY regularly) but I can never find a game. In fact, I've only played bots. 3 or 4 servers show up in the ut2004 browser search but they're always empty. Anyone know any servers and when games are being played? I have a machine I could set up as a designated server, but my connection is just regular cable, so I could never handle it.

Seriously, this mod is so dope, I don't know why no one is playing (or hopefully I just can't find them).

item.title: dead links and mirror
item.author: invalid@example.com (hollib)
item.dc:creator: hollib
item.content:encoded:
There might be dead links for some of my downloads, changed my hosting, so all clone bandits stuff is now upped to filefront.

http://www.filefront.com/user/biohazardjo

item.title: Post if you read this!
item.author: invalid@example.com (BrutusCirrus)
item.dc:creator: BrutusCirrus
item.content:encoded: Man, Clone Bandits... what an awesome game

item.title: Any sign of new maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (cravensmythe)
item.dc:creator: cravensmythe
item.content:encoded:
I wondered if any of you mappers were near to completion on a new clone bandits map?

The game is great but I think everyone (players and server hosts) is having a break from the current map after playing it 23 hours straight everyday for about 5 weeks. Currently there seems to be no servers and no players.

It seems a shame because I miss the speed of gameplay and the comedy antics when I go back to onslaught.

Also wondered if any mappers had considered putting in any non player...

Any sign of new maps?

item.title: k1 Server running clone bandits...
item.author: invalid@example.com (k1Ninja)
item.dc:creator: k1Ninja
item.content:encoded:
I currently have my 14 man public server running Clone Bandits with 3 maps, DeathValley, PerilPlateau, and ProcessingPlant.

216.52.148.223


All the files are redirected, so even if you dont have the mod installed, it will do it for you.

Have fun.

item.title: Fledgling Bandit needs help.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Styleito)
item.dc:creator: Styleito
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I'm relatively new to Clone Bandits but, I love this mod. I would like to play the maps that some of you have created but, I'm having a little trouble. I've installed a few things that I downloaded from here and I now have 16 CLN maps in my UT2K4 maps folder. But, I only have about 6 or 7 showing in the ingame maplist. I tried launching some of them manually buy received a missing file error. Here are some of the files that I'm missing:

BenTropicalSM01
HourAdaraTexor
PC_UrbanTex...

Fledgling Bandit needs help.

item.title: So did you guys play? Did it all work?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vito)
item.dc:creator: Vito
item.content:encoded: Was there a match yesterday? Did the server work okay?

item.title: Lovemail + Criticism (Best MOD ever!)
item.author: invalid@example.com (BrutusCirrus)
item.dc:creator: BrutusCirrus
item.content:encoded:
First of, I have to say I love you guys! You have made the MOD I think, should of won the Make something unreal contest.

I found out about you by reading PCGAMER where they featured you as MOD of the Month. I say they've made the right decision!


Best part of the MOD would be the Moscocowboy! I love just riding it up cliffs, and just generally driving it!

Of with the advice to make this mod better:

Add a vehicle or two more?

As much as I love the Moscocowboy, how about making...

Lovemail + Criticism (Best MOD ever!)

item.title: CB server down for a bit
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vito)
item.dc:creator: Vito
item.content:encoded:
Apparently I suck, so my CB server hasn't been working right lately.

I've taken it down and will be reinstalling it, including hopefully properly dealing with the map pack. I'll be using the .rar that was posted here the other day. It should be back up soon (I'll post when it is), so after that, feel free to keep posting in this thread until you play and see the maps properly $#)%(*#$% switching.

Thanks,
Vito
Admin for mavra.perilith.com

item.title: Need music.
item.author: invalid@example.com (BrutusCirrus)
item.dc:creator: BrutusCirrus
item.content:encoded:
Right dudes, i need the names of the music that any of the map packs use, preferably the oringal ones but Hollib's ones are good or any of them,


Thanks for the help.

item.title: Clone Bandits "Event" today, 20h GMT
item.author: invalid@example.com (Funktion)
item.dc:creator: Funktion
item.content:encoded:
A few people are gathering to play on the official Clone Bandits server (16 slots; for those who don't know the Demiurges server is called "DS #2 Clone Bandits @ mavra.perilith.com) later today, at 20h GMT.

The files needed are Clone Bandits 1.1, and maybe the "3 Amigos Map Pack" (a bonus mappack made by the Clone Bandits community), if the Admin. updates the server in time. You can download this pack here: http://unrealbox.de/public/zoldmaps.rar.

If things turn out OK we...

Clone Bandits "Event" today, 20h GMT

item.title: Where to download the 3 Amigos Map Pack, plus map recommendations
item.author: invalid@example.com (Funktion)
item.dc:creator: Funktion
item.content:encoded:
I just re-instaled Clone Bandits. When I tried it out the first time, it only had one map and while it was fun I totally forgot about it...

Anyway, I'm having lots of fun with the three maps, and wanted some more. The link from this forum for the "3 Amigos Map Pack" isn't working, so I was wondering if anyone knows any working link?

Also, what good maps (with bot support) are available, and where can I download them?

PS: If anyone from the mod's team reads this, you should...

Where to download the 3 Amigos Map Pack, plus map recommendations

item.title: Scheduled games?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ReLiK)
item.dc:creator: ReLiK
item.content:encoded:
It seems every time I check the CB gametype the servers are empty.

So why don't we arrange some kind of pre-arranged time. Similar to the Jailbreak Sunday lockdown.

Once a week, for say 2-3 hours, on a good server (East coast US should suit most people, since I'm in the UK) we all know where to be.

Any takers?

item.title: could someone do me a favor......
item.author: invalid@example.com (Screech)
item.dc:creator: Screech
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure who here (other than the demiurge guys) knows much about making staticmeshes......so anyway.......what I was wondering was, could someone edit the pipeteepee staticmesh for me by taking off the bottom "teepee" part and leaving only the broken pipe? This is by no means a necesity but having something like this would make my new map better.....so if anyone has some extra time on their hands.........

If there is some way i could do this myself, awesome, just point me in...

could someone do me a favor......

item.title: Running a server.
item.author: invalid@example.com (WileyPeyote)
item.dc:creator: WileyPeyote
item.content:encoded: Hello, I am going to be adding Clone Bandits to my east coast linux server. I have never added a mod before so I was just wondering what I have to add to the server ini file and also what to add to be votable. I am using the built in mapvote. Thanks!

item.title: CB Vehicles
item.author: invalid@example.com (caboose88)
item.dc:creator: caboose88
item.content:encoded: Is there a way to get the vehicles in another gametype? Perhaps a mutator for a server or something? I really like the Cuda and Moscowboy, and I would like to mess around with them in other modes.

item.title: PM awards and your file hosted !
item.author: invalid@example.com ([Pmods]Necrophage)
item.dc:creator: [Pmods]Necrophage
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys !

On Pmods we have put a new space called Pmods Awards where the readers have to vote for their favourite mods and clone bandits figure in the list ! Check out the PMA page !

Adding to that, we have uploaded Clone Bandits and people can download it by this Page.

By the way, congratulations for...

PM awards and your file hosted !

item.title: Awards
item.author: invalid@example.com (Aconite)
item.dc:creator: Aconite
item.content:encoded: Would it be possible to have end-of-round awards, particularly in recognition of stunts in the barracuda? Or perhaps a mega-kill-esque announcement when someone earns 5 or more nitros from one stunt?

item.title: Reviews From The Media
item.author: invalid@example.com (EngineerShorty)
item.dc:creator: EngineerShorty
item.content:encoded:
"The Most Important Video Game, EVER!"
-The Associated Press

"The most important historical event of our time is... the release of Clone Bandits to the public."
-Weekly World News

"The only thing more perfect than God!"
-TIME Magazine

"If your children don't love Clone Bandits. . . SMOTHER THEM WITH A PILLOW!"
-Newsweek

"We love the pink tank."
-CMU Out

"...I was so terrified by it, I still can't get the brown marks off my chair."
-Shorty
